page.title: 08The Vicar of Bayford
page.content: We interviewed the Rev. John Cotton and he told us the church serves the parish of Bayford and Brickendon. During the summer only{4 services}are held each month. The 3 winter services are 1st Sunday in month, Matins 11am 2nd Sunday in month, H.Communion 8am 4th Sunday in month,P.Communion 9:30am In summer 3rd Sunday in month Evensong The most popular services are Matins and P. Communion with 20_25 people attending each. Holy Communion has just 7_8 people attending. Bayford and Brickendon parish is a member of{Hertford Hundred West group {of parishes}which was formed because of{declining church attendance,}and although numbers have gone up in recent years a large percentage attending are elderly. This is a cause for concern for the future.
